description: Prohibition on Dec Actions: Prohibits an agency from suing a requestor for making a public record request

Agency Contracts: Stipulates that financial information in agency contracts is subject to disclosure

Public Meetings: Strengthens public speaking requirements for public boards and commissions

Prohibited Recordkeeeping: Repeals current law criminalizing creation of databases of gun owners

Killing of a Person: Exempts all audio and video that depicts events leading up to and following the killing of a person (amended on the House floor to protect only those audios and videos depicting the killing of victims of a mass shooting)
School Marshals: Exempts all information about school personnel allowed to carry guns onto school grounds
